#GPRepost, #reposter, #notetag @reina_nagata via @RepostApp ======> @reina_nagata: LACHIC CENTURY SESSION  
Today's guests were Miku Kobato and Kanami from BAND-MAID!  
It was my first time seeing BAND-MAID. After experiencing their live performance, or rather, their okyuji, for the first time the other day, I was blown away by how cool they are and became a total fan! I was really looking forward to meeting them today! They have a unique world view like nothing I've seen before.
A passerby bassist! ğŸ¸

The skewers I had on a day off with my mom the other day.  
Nishi-Ogikubo is the best!  

I want to eat meat every day.  
I want to eat sashimi every day too!

en:
Happy New Year! ğŸ

In 2017, we released our 1st full album "Just Bring It" and our 3rd single "Daydreaming/Choose me." We toured across the country and around the world, and alongside that, we worked on the production and recording of our 2nd full album "WORLD DOMINATION," which is set to be released on February 14th. We were able to perform at many festivals, which was a long-held dream of ours, and we took the stage for our solo okyuji at big venues like Akasaka BLITZ, Ebisu LIQUIDROOM, Shin-Kiba STUDIO COAST, and Zepp DiverCity TOKYO.
My beloved cat Kururu is doing well too! Just like a kagami mochi ğŸŠ

Today was filled with interviews and long rehearsals!! I felt a change in my feelings towards the guitar, and during rehearsal, I was thinking about how important it is to play each note with even more care. Being able to play the guitar isn't something to take for granted, and being part of BAND-MAID feels like a miracle! I'm still inexperienced, but I'll do my best!! #bandmaid #PRS #mesaboogie #orangecabinet

Collaborative work.  
MISA is getting better at the drums!

Today is rehearsal (*Â´ê’³`*)âœ¨ The WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018ã€Announcementã€‘starts on April 4th (Wed) at Nagoya Diamond Hallâœ¨

The pre-sale for the tickets ends today, so hurry up (ï½€ï½¥Ï‰ï½¥Â´)ï¾‰

After rehearsal, I went to Qpu (@qpu_kogao) for a facial contouring session! Since there are various shoots coming up, I made sure to get all the tension out of my face (ï½€ï½¥Ï‰ï½¥Â´)ï¾‰ooo (Stay tuned to find out what the shoot is for...â™¡) #mesaboogie #prs #orangecabinet #

My hair is all curly now ğŸ•Š  
It seems like I've added more red to the tips.  
I got it all pretty and nice!  
#RISEL

It seems like I've customized it!  
It's so much fun and cute... ğŸ•Š  
#newneu

I went to the Japanese tea specialty shop "Shimokita Chasen Ooyama" in Shimokitazawa with MISA and had their matcha ice cream! 

I've wanted to visit this place for so long, so I'm really happy I finally got to go! It was rich and super delicious! I recommend it to all matcha lovers ğŸµ

I want to try their matcha kakigori this summer too!

#ShimokitaChasenOoyama #Matcha

#BANDMAID #FirstOkyujiOfTheNewYear  
#WorldDomination #FromJapan #ToTheWorld #ThankYouForComing

The first live show of 2018 was a two-man with vivid undress.

It was intense.
All the pent-up energy was released like crazy!

I realized once again how great it feels to make music.

Now, a bit late, but my resolutions for 2018 are:
To become even better at handling alcohol.
To become a cooler bassist.
Please continue to support BAND-MAID!

We made "Melt-in-your-mouth Love White Stew," "Butter Soy Sauce Stir-fried Three Kinds of Mushrooms," and "Stamina-packed, Flavor-packedâ˜† Garlic Sprout Stir-fried Chicken Gizzards."

I learned how to cut the chicken gizzards, as well as the correct way to hold and use a knife.

Sai-chan taught me the stew, MISA taught me omelet rice and pasta, Kanami taught me fried rice, and Miku taught me tofu hamburgers. They're all such amazing cooks!

Everyone helped me out while we cooked together, so this year, Iâ€™m really going to work hard on my cooking! (I promise)

Starting today, we have a 3-day okyuji at eggman!

I've received so much love from eggman, and I have tons of memories there, but let me share one heartwarming episode with the amazing staff.

I desperately wanted the Shinobu-chan figure from the "Monogatari" series, but no matter how hard I tried, I just couldn't get my hands on it.

Then, out of nowhere, the entire eggman staff came together to get the figure for me and surprised me with it on my birthday! ğŸâœ¨

I wonder how many times they entered the lottery for me... ğŸ˜­

I'm truly grateful!

ROCK IN JAPAN FESTIVAL 2018  
.  
I was able to stand on the stage of my long-time dream, ROCK IN JAPAN.  
.  
During the 30 minutes I was given, I poured all my feelings into the performance so that I wouldn't have any regrets.  
.  
I had so much fun from the bottom of my heart.  
The view from the stage is something I will never forget for the rest of my life.  
.  
Thank you so much to everyone who chose to be at the BAND-MAID stage and for meeting us!!!!  
.

Back in my second year of high school, I discovered my love for bands thanks to my friends, and I learned just how fun live shows can be. The festival I attended the most was Rock in Japan!

When we got the news that weâ€™d be performing at Rock in Japan, I received so many happy messages from the friends I always went to festivals with, and it really moved me.

Iâ€™m a bit greedy now, as Iâ€™ve developed dreams and goals of performing on even bigger stages!

Iâ€™ll level up and definitely come back again! ğŸ”¥

...I won't forget!

en:
2018.9.1  
C3AFA Jakarta 2018 "I LOVE ANISONG" ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡©  

Our first okyuji in Indonesia! It was so much fun!!  

I love anisong, so I was really happy to perform at such an amazing and energetic event!  

Thank you to everyone who watched us on Nico Nico Live! I hope you could feel the excitement of our okyuji!  

Thank you so much, Indonesia! We'll work hard to come back for a one-man show next time!  

Terima Kasihâœ¨

C3AFA Jakarta 2018 ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡©  
Before our okyuji, we went to check out the venue!  

There were so many anime booths, and at the BANDAI booth, they had Gunpla on display. There were also tons of anime and game merchandise and figures for sale. It was so much fun that we ended up going around the venue multiple times! You could spend the whole day there and never get bored!  

There were lots of people in anime cosplay at the venue, and I was surprised to see so many people dressed as the platelets from "Cells at Work," both guys and girls! It's great to see that the anime that's popular in Japan is also trending in Indonesia!  

That...
Genegenegene! ğŸ¶

Today, I wore my favorite gray raglan! I really love the design on the back. I wonder if everyone else is wearing it too. I paired it with #nikeairmax95 sneakers in a yellow gradient. Taking good care of them! 

#bandmaid #saiki

BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019ã€Invasionã€‘  
We're less than a week away!!  
It starts on September 12th!  
We're heading to Kanagawa, Ishikawa, Niigata, Hiroshima, Okayama, Aichi, Miyagi, Kagawa, Osaka, Hokkaido, Fukuoka, Kumamoto, Kyoto, Hyogo, Nagano, Yamanashi, and Tokyo!!!! #worlddomination #bandmaid #invasiontour #japaneserock  
#mesaboogie #triplerectifier

With the tour starting soon, I went to recharge my energy at a restaurant that lifts your spirits! âœ¨ğŸ’• The dessert inspired by sunflowers was absolutely beautiful (*Â´ê’³`*). They say the real sunflower petals are candied! So cute! ğŸ’•ğŸ’• 

As for the meat, I had the choice between "pigeon" and "beef," but I felt bad for Kobato-san, so I went with beef instead (ã€€ï¾ŸÏ‰ï¾Ÿ).

The first ramen I had after returning to Japan was the Gomoku Ramen from KÅtÅ Ramen "Chorori" ğŸœ

The broth has a simple and gentle flavor. The fried green onions are a fantastic accent.

And you can't miss the fried rice at Chorori! The seasoning with pepper, the slightly firm rice, and the perfect fluffiness all come together beautifully. It's absolutely exquisite.

#Ebisu #KÅtÅRamen #Chorori #Ramen #NoodleStagram #NoodleLife

Introducing the sacoche from our invasion tour merchandise! A sacoche is like a pouch or a shoulder bag! (For those of you older gentlemen wondering if it's okay for you to carry one, donâ€™t worry! Itâ€™s totally fine! No problem at all!) 

Here's a video showing how much you can fit inside. You can easily fit your wallet, disinfecting wipes, phone, keys (the Doctor Yellow carabiner one), eye drops (the Sailor Moon ones), and lip balm! 

Young folks and older gentlemen, make sure to grab one! 

#bandmaid #saiki

#clubcitta #Invasion #tour #OpeningDay  
I'm feeling super pumped and ready to fly!! ğŸ‰

@ninemicsphoto's cute ğŸ¤©ğŸ’• It suddenly got cold, but itâ€™s perfect and awesome! ğŸ˜ŠğŸ‘ŒğŸ»ğŸ’•ğŸ’•ğŸ’•  
I really like the bold design. I wish the guys would wear it casually too. Just a thought I have every day. Want it!  
I paired it with #nikemoreuptempo sneakersâœŒğŸ»

Thank you to everyone who came home yesterday! I was so happy to celebrate my birthday with so many Masters and Princesses! ğŸ˜­ğŸ’•âœ¨âœ¨  
.  
For those who couldnâ€™t make it, thank you for all the lovely messages!! ğŸ˜ŠğŸ’•ğŸ’•

Let me share a bit about yesterdayâ€™s okyujiâ™«  
.  
The other day, A-chan and Sai-chan were separately talking about "What kind of artist..."

Some of the things we ate in Okayama

I've been eating udon and pie cake since forever. I always go to eat them when I return to Okayama.

And then there's the white skewered itemâ€”this is chicken testicles. It had a taste similar to high-quality tofu. So bouncy! 
I also had squid roe, "ika chichi." You can find this at the izakaya "Gokuraku Tonbo." Thank you for the meal! The liver sashimi was also amazing.

en:
Memories from Day 5 of the tour at Okayama CRAZYMAMA KINGDOM

Since it's the land of Momotaro, I ended up playing Momotaro along with his friends and the demons. I challenged the demon with a sword I bought for 100 yen, but they came at me with a golf club and an iron rod, so I lost. 

Akane and Sai-chan worked hard on my headband and the animal features, among other things. I really felt the love!

This is probably my first and last time as Misa-Taro. LOL I totally broke character, too! 

Iâ€™m so glad I could come back to Okayama for another live show! I want to go again next year!

en:
2018.9.28  
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019ã€Invasionã€‘@Zepp Nagoya  

Zepp Nagoya is a venue filled with memories for me; it was the first place I ever traveled to for a live show with a friend back in high school.  

During the venue rehearsal, I stood at the front row on the right side of the floor, where I used to stand back then, looking up at the stage. It hit me hard to think that today I would be up there playing the drums!  

I'm so happy to be able to stand on the stages of the live houses and festivals I used to admire!  

Next up, SOLD OUT at Zepp!

It was our first solo okyuji in Kagawa!  

I've been to Kagawa a few times for Sanuki Rock and Marugame Castle Festival, but finally made it for a solo show! Yay! It was so much fun!  

During the MC, Sai-chan and I introduced our merchandise.  

The members' favorite sacoche is actually perfect for holding udon noodles! You can even fit udon noodles in the front mesh pocket, so you can drain them too (?) It's a fantastic item!

WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019ã€Invasionã€‘@ Osaka Namba Hatch  

We've already reached the halfway point of the Invasion Tour! Time flies! It's going by way too fast!!!  

We packed a ton into the setlist, including the debut of "Screaming," the new song "glory," and a new instrumental track. I hope everyone was able to keep up!  

The new instrumental track we showcased today was created by Kanami for Ochi Ken-san at ROCK KIDS802â™«  
Did those of you listening to the radio catch that? ğŸ’¡  

The drum solo is on bass!

en:
Thank you for all the birthday messages poğŸ•Š

For my birthday, I went to my favorite #Kyoto and enjoyed it all by myself. I walked around #Arashiyama and visited #MiffySakuraKitchen to eat my beloved grilled sweetfish. I also went to #RokkakudoChohji, which I visit every year, and to my absolute favorite matcha shop in the world!! Of course, I also went to #KyotoRacecourse to see the #Kikukasho!! (I lost, but it was still fun.) I brought along the shaka shaka Miffy cushion I met in Arashiyama!

The other day, MISA and I went to the "2018 Musical Instrument Fair"! 

I was so happy to meet the wonderful people from the drum manufacturer TAMA and the cymbal maker Zildjian. I also got to see folks from Rittor Music, ZOOM, and Hook Up!

There were so many things I wanted to try out that one day just wasn't enough! It was so much fun, and my excitement was at MAX the moment we arrived at the venue!

Above all, my love for instruments has deepened.

Being able to enjoy playing the drums every day is thanks to all the support I receive! ğŸ¶

At the "2018 Musical Instrument Fair," we were beyond excited to visit the EVANGELION corner at the booth of Kyoritsu Corporation, who has been so supportive of BAND-MAID!! (For a moment, I forgot I was at a musical instrument fair.)

Unit 01â€”!!!

Thank you so, so much, Kyoritsu Corporation, for the absolutely amazing EVA collaborationâ€¦!!

I've already purchased Asuka's cross!

Even though I'm a drummer, I want to display Asuka's cabinet in my room and admire it.

And even though I'm a drummer, I also want to display the pick, strap, and case in my room and admire them.

The original AKANE sticks are complete! ğŸ¥

These original sticks are packed with my "likes"!

I asked Ai-chan from September Me to design them!

I previously posted on Instagram about having a super exciting meeting with Ai-chan, and that was about the stick design! âœ¨

I definitely wanted to include the BAND-MAID logo & symbol mark, as well as my favorite things: cats and stars. I conveyed all my requests, and she quickly sketched a rough draft on the spot, just as I had imagined!

Kanami gifted me a figure of Rei Ayanami, so I decided to display it next to my Unit-00 (Revised)! Perfect! âœ¨

Unit-00 (Revised) is the very first model kit I ever attempted to build, and I completed it as a memorable milestone! (For more details, check out the "BAND-MAID's Moe Kyun â™¡ Maid's Day Off Episode 9" column on GekiRock. LOL)

Last year on my birthday, everyone gifted me a model kit of Unit-02, so I need to finish that one up and get it in the lineup soon!

Building model kits takes a lot of time and can be quite challenging, but the sense of accomplishment when you finish is incredible.

I'm a beginner, but next, I want to challenge myself with painting too! ğŸ¨

2018.12.16  
After the Yamanashi live, we had a surprise at the after-party & year-end party...!!

Once again, I was celebrated for my birthday by the members, Sai-chan's family, and everyone from the BAND-MAID team...!

I was truly shocked when the lights suddenly went out in the venue, and Sai-chan and her mom came in with a cake.

I received so many warm, kind, and happy words from everyone that I ended up crying a lot. ğŸ˜‚  
The cute members couldnâ€™t help but tear up along with me.

They laugh with me during the fun times and cry with me during the sad times.

Itâ€™s as beautiful as the illuminations!!

Weâ€™re gearing up hard for the first tour finale of the new year! I canâ€™t wait to see everyoneâ€™s reactions â˜ºï¸

When you think of Kyoto, you can't help but think of that legendary band's music! That's right! The sudden formation of "BAND-MAIKO" on this year's April Fool's Day!  

We had our first reveal of BAND-MAIKO's secret MAIKO lips!  
Ah! It was so much fun! Too much fun!  

We recreated the initial drum sound using a floor tom, and the crowd was filled with gasps of "Wait!? Could it be!?" and "Ohhh!?" So I couldn't stop grinning the whole time! ğŸ˜Š

Looks like we're taking a trip down memory lane to 2018! ğŸ•Šï¸

My beloved hometown! Kobe!! I was so happy to finally be able to perform a one-man okyuji here~ ğŸ’“  

When I was a child (probably around 2 years old), MISA Mama carried me on her back.  

I grew up strong and became a big-eating drummer. And now I'm living my best life!

Thank you so much for all your support this year! ğŸ¥° I was so happy to share so many moments with our Masters, Princesses, and OMEISYUSAMA, and to see such amazing sights together.

Since it was my birthday!  
During the MCs, I usually do whatever I want, but on this day, I left everything up to the members.  

The members read a letter saying, "Iâ€™d like to take this opportunity to express my gratitude for your daily support." I was so moved that I was almost in tears.

The soles? Even the bottoms of the shoes are cute! ğŸ¥°ğŸ¥°ğŸ¥°

I'm wearing a shirt made of pile fabric from NineMicrophones? ğŸ‘”ğŸ‘ŒğŸ»ğŸ’• It's super cute! On that day, I wore it buttoned over a tight black turtleneck knit dress. It looked nice!

en: I just visited #teamLabBorderless in Odaiba! It felt like I jumped into another dimension; it was such a mysterious space that left me truly moved. It wasn't just beautiful; it had a beauty you could feel with your body. Flowers bloomed and scattered in response to my movements, butterflies were born and disappeared, water flowed around me as if avoiding me, and it felt like I was completely immersed in waves. There were even flowers blooming in my tea... It's a feeling that words can't really capture. There were so many different spaces, and depending on the time...

en:
I went strawberry picking with my family ğŸ“ğŸ’• 

Last year it was just with my mom, but this year my big brother joined us too. Heâ€™s always so kind to me. Even though we look alike, our vibes are totally different, so a lot of people donâ€™t believe weâ€™re siblings. 

I really feel like weâ€™re a close-knit family. 

It was a fun and refreshing day! 

When I go strawberry picking, I want to eat and eat and eat until Iâ€™m completely satisfied. This year, Sai-chan ate 40 strawberries like usual and ended up with a stomachache. My brother only managed to eat 18. But can you believe it? Mom ate 90 strawberries! ğŸ“âœ¨

The photoshoot was done by @akane_bandmaid ğŸ•Š

This year, BAND-MAIKO was able to return, announce new songs, shoot an MV in Kyoto, release a mini-album, and even appear on DAM CHANNEL...!!

I was filled with joy at all these wonderful experiences. It was an absolute blast!

I don't think there are many bands that enjoy April Fool's Day as wholeheartedly as we do. Haha!

I hope everyone was surprised and had fun this year too!

Let's definitely meet again! Thank you so much!

That's what Akatsuki said â™¡

#bandmaiko

we were able to shoot the "Gion Town" MV over two days in Kyoto, the sacred place of maiko! 

Thanks to the director, the filming crew, the kimono dressers, the hair and makeup artists, and all the staff who set up the equipment and provided support. Despite the long and challenging shoot in the cold from morning till night, everyone kept smiling and made it a bright and fun experience that blew away our fatigue this year.

On the first day of filming, we also had a surprise celebration for Fujihime's birthday, which became a special memory. We were so happy to see Fujihime delighted, and the surprise was a huge success! ğŸ‚âœ¨

And...

en:
Did you read the final installment of GiGS June issue, "Hey! One Drum Please!"? ğŸ¥

I had the pleasure of being a drum instructor for a whole year, and it was an absolute blast! Everything was a first for me, and I was quite nervous, but thanks to everyone's warm support, I was able to reach the final episode safely!

What a perfect way to wrap things up as we close the Heisei era!

In the photo, I'm with the wonderful GiGS editorial team who supported me throughout the year.

Thank you for always summarizing my words, which lack vocabulary, in such a clear and thoughtful way. I looked forward to seeing everyone at GiGS every time, as the atmosphere was always bright and fun!

en:
The okyuji in Taiwan was amazing! âœ¨  
Everyone's Japanese was so good! â™«  

The tapioca was delicious, and the xiaolongbao was also fantastic!! âœ¨  
After the okyuji, I was taken for a massage... and the store manager's dog provided such wonderful service that I was truly moved! It was incredibly cute... ğŸ¶  

For a dog lover, it was just perfect... The massage was incredible (ã€€ï¾ŸÏ‰ï¾Ÿ)  
We all got our backs cracked (ã€€ï¾ŸÏ‰ï¾Ÿ) It was scary, but it fixed a lot of things!!! âœ¨  
I signed and went home with a smileâ™ª  

Everyone in Taiwan is so kind and warm!  
Taiwan is...
Taiwan was so much fun! Thank you, everyone! ğŸ˜Š

en:
Kobato here from my recent trip to Asakusa!  
I got to ride on a panda for the first time in a while, and it just so happened to be the day of the #HÅzuki Market at Senso-ji Temple, so there were tons of food stalls! I enjoyed my favorite grilled sweetfish and even tried my hand at shooting games!  
I stumbled upon a kimono shop while walking around, and I found an adorable haori for just 500 yen! I also bought a kanzashi, and it made me so happy!  
The main reason for my visit was to finally go to the cafÃ© called #Tengoku that I've been wanting to check out! I had some old-fashioned pancakes and a hot dog, and they were delicious! âœ¨  
#Asakusa is such a wonderful place!

The other day, I had a curry lunch with A-chanğŸ’• 

It's a newly renovated place, and it was my first time there since the renovation ( Â´âˆ€ï½€)âœ¨ 
It was so pretty and cute~ğŸ’• 
.
.

I really love the coffee hereâ™« 
The curry was super delicious too (ï½€ï½¥Ï‰ï½¥Â´)b

Time has flown by since our tour in Europe... 

The final of the #DynamicChapter's #DynamicTour is finally tomorrow! 
(There will be additional performances too, though) 
Weâ€™ll be serving at Showa Women's University Hitomi Memorial Hall.

I hope we can show a new side of the maids... and enchant everyone! 

The photo was taken when we were returning from Europe. 

Sneakers: #nikeairforce1 

On the suitcase, there's #ninemicrophones.

2019.8.27  
"Da Nana Night vol.125" @ TSUTAYA O-EAST  

I've always wanted to perform at Da Nana Night!  
And I've always wanted to share the stage with Dizzy Sunfist & Backdrop Cinderella!  

I had so much fun from the bottom of my heart...!!  
I got so caught up in the excitement that I lost track of my memories. LOL  

I was watching Bakushin and Dizzy's live performance from the second floor, but before I knew it, I was at the side of the stage, and during Dizzy's "Someday," I found myself on the floor, on top of people. LOL  

To all the Dizzy fans and everyone on the floor, thank you for safely catching me and welcoming me into the group! ğŸ’–

Let's do it again, haha! I want to do a joint performance.

en: The other day, we wrapped up our intense local okyuji in Kumamoto. It was a long, deep, and fast-paced okyuji. The World Domination tour has been a real challenge, with us changing the setlist more than ever before and trying out all sorts of new things. Wow, Kumamoto's okyuji really surprised me! Kobato had no idea and was totally relaxed. ğŸ˜‚ I was sweating so much after the show, I felt like I had just taken a bath! It was the best Kumamoto okyuji ever. And I was really touched by the kindness of the Masters and Princesses in Kumamoto. This was my first time experiencing such an intense okyuji there!

Good evening!  
.  
Recently, I swapped out my pickups for ones with PRS's 59/09 covers ğŸ’• (I've been using them since my okyuji in Kagoshima!)  
.  
Dai-chan from tech (@daisuke_kondo) helped me with the swap! Thank you as always (*Â´ê’³`*)ğŸ’•  
.  
.  
.  
As for my impressions after the change...  
.  
Before, there were some parts in the ensemble that felt a bit lacking, and I was quite concerned about the differences compared to my other guitars ğŸ¤”  
.  
After the swap, while maintaining the low-end, the mid-highs have a nice sharpness, and the ensemble...

The third day of the dress rehearsal has successfully concluded! It was an intense three days! ğŸ”¥

We went through multiple setlist changes, and finally, we've crafted the ultimate setlist that everyone is satisfied with!!

Get ready for ã€Evolutionã€‘ 2 days!

And now that the date has changed, today is our vocalist SAIKI's birthday! ğŸ‚

During a break in the rehearsal, we pulled off an early surprise! We prepared a cake and a giant cracker, and the whole BAND-MAID team celebrated together! ğŸ‰

Happy birthday, Sai-chan!!

Just before her birthday, I received a LINE message from Sai-chan saying, "I learned a new word!"

Since we released the MV, I've been so happy to hear that many of you want to copy the guitar solo from "Blooming"! (*Â´ê’³`*)ğŸ’•  
I played the tapping solo slowly, so please use it as a reference~â™ª  
I usually tap with my middle finger while holding the pick~â£ï¸  
Also, today I was wearing my Sai-chan T-shirtğŸ’• Sai-chan looks so coolğŸ’•  
And now! It's officially February 8thâœ¨âœ¨  
Today is~âœ¨ Sai-chan's birthday! Clap clap clap clap~ğŸ’•  
Happy birthday, Sai-chan! ğŸ‰ğŸ‚

Kobato's favorite things to make ğŸ•Š  
- Hot milk + tea + Manuka honey or honey-like sweetness. Itâ€™s like a mellow, lightly sweet royal milk tea. My favorite teas are #harneyandsons or #TWG.  
- I regularly make detox soup! Just throw in carrots, daikon, onions, celery, cabbage, chicken, canned tomatoes, a bit of consomme, and parsley into a pot! Simmer it all together, and at the end, let it bubble with some eggs for the finishing touch. Itâ€™s packed with veggies, rich in fiber, warms you up, tastes great, and fills you up, so I make it regularly!

I'm thinking of trying out the "UV2" on my snare right away. I can't wait to create some amazing sounds!

en:
Here's an explanation of the pre-session for the song we performed during the WORLD DOMINATION TOUR ã€Evolutionã€‘ in February.

First, we start from the 4th fret of the 5th string.

This solo doesn't involve too much movement between frets!

The right hand is key here.

Make sure to keep the rhythm steady by alternating between thumb slapping and pulling with your fingers.

The ending is a bit tricky, so be sure to link the movements of your left and right hands well. 
I hope everyone gives it a try and copies it!

#bandmaid #worlddomin

en:
Today is #MaidDay ğŸ•Š  
Please continue to support #bandmaid from now on!  
With Pearl-chan from #zemaitis.  
It's also #Mother'sDay, isn't it?  
Thank you always, Mom! ğŸ•Š

Next up is an explanation of the solo section in DOMINATION.

The initial phrase has a bit of a bouncy feel, so slap it out! 

For the first note, use your thumb to hit the 4th fret on the 5th string with some fast thumb picking. This part is quite quick, so relax your hand and play it smoothly.

Right after the slap, switch to using a pick! (Make sure to practice that switch, okay? Haha!)

Once you've switched, move to the 11th and 13th frets on the 2nd string in the higher frets.

From here to the end, there will be some string skips, making it pretty challenging... This is where you really need to put in the effort! 

And...

How's everyone doing?

I want all our Masters and Princesses to stay healthy! ğŸ•ŠğŸ•Š

en:
The online okyuji was so much fun!!

Thank you to all the Masters and Princesses around the world who tuned in!!

Thanks to all the comments during the stream, I felt like I was serving you all in the venue together.

I was really happy to see the BAND-MAID team after 5 months! It felt so reassuring.

Thank you so much to the Masters, Princesses, everyone on the BAND-MAID team, the video team, and the venue staff for allowing me to serve you!

I can't wait to see everyone's faces in person soon!
Sorry everyone! I was playing the bass with this face. ğŸ˜…

Sai-chan got me an Asuka from the gacha! 

So sweet! Thank you! Please donâ€™t poke Asuka in the eye. 

Iâ€™ll display it next to my mixer. 

My drum set is ordered in a color scheme inspired by Asuka, so itâ€™s a perfect match! 

I think Iâ€™ll name my drum set "Unit 02." 

#drums #tama #evansdrumheads #zildjian #wincent #KyoryuCorporation #evangelionart

en:
Thank you for the online okyuji!! 

It was so much fun this time too!! I hope everyone enjoyed it as well! 

How did you like the "Athletic-themed setlist" that I named? 

Phew. I worked up a good sweat~ 

I think I might have lost some weight. I'm going to get super buff! 

I was also really happy to play some songs I haven't performed in a while! 

Let's hang out again, everyoneâœŒï¸ 

#bandmaid

Which is which? 

By the way, I'm getting a perm on the back of my hair soon, so I'll be saying goodbye to my silky straight hair for a while. 
Goodbye, silky hair. 
Everyone, please accept this!

en:
I love simple outfits, but sometimes I just want to wear something flashy too! 

Oh, by the way. 

Yesterday, while A-chan @akane_bandmaid was taking pictures, I was supposed to say, "Sai-chan, that looks great!" but suddenly my pronunciation went all wrong, and I ended up saying, "Shai-shan, shore ii!" I completely butchered the "sa" sounds, and we all burst out laughing! Iâ€™m sharing that moment in the last photo. 

Thanks for always taking such great pics, A-chan! I really appreciate it! 

#ootd  
#bandmaid  
#saiki

Hereâ€™s what we looked like after yesterday's online okyuji. 

Everyone's hair color looks amazingãƒ¼ãƒ¼ãƒ¼ğŸ‘ 

For the first day, I got my hair dyed really dark, almost black, and over the course of a week, it was designed to gradually reveal the color just in time for the online okyuji. It turned out exactly as planned!! 

@watai_yuu, youâ€™re incredibleğŸ‘ 

And @kobatomiku, those arm muscles are impressive tooğŸ‘

I quickly put on the parma! Please accept it! 

The one who took the two-shot with @yutd_666 is Akane, who suddenly appeared halfway through. ğŸ˜Š

en:
Maintenance Day for the equipment! ğŸ¥

Since I was near my alma mater, TSM Shibuya, I passed by the school on my way home and spotted some teachers! ğŸ«ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ«

I also ran into my senior, Arita from CIVILIAN (@drumcivilian), and since I was wearing a T-shirt from @room.13_official, I decided to pretend that my other senior, Eguchi from BLUE ENCOUNT (@bluengt), was there too (forcing it, lol). Alumni gathering!!!

It brought back so many memories. The best one was the overseas training.

During the overseas training, I went to America and learned a lot at Citrus College, and it was my first time recording in my life!

I fell in love at first sight with this dress from @junokamoto_dky at last year's spring/summer exhibition and ordered it. 

It's beautiful from every angle! 

I was also drawn to the name given to the outfit, "like melted ice candy." 

Recently, I bought a coat and a dress that I've wanted since the 2020-21 autumn/winter exhibition at the Daikanyama store, so I'm really looking forward to wearing my new outfits this fall and winter! â˜ºï¸â™ª

Thank you so much, Jun-san!!

#junokamoto

How's everyone doing?  
Amidst the busy days of production,  
Kobato has gotten the cutest sunglasses ever!  
They're adorable whether I wear them or just place them down.  
I even got them in a soft blue, and when I wear them, it feels like my favorite Tiffany blue! ğŸ•ŠğŸ•Š  
They go perfectly with gold, and I've never had sunglasses that fit so well!  
I especially recommend them to all the Princesses!  
There were so many lens color options too!  
Thank you, Issey-san! ğŸ•¶

en:
Lately, I've been drawn to Japanese culture, so I got myself a tiger-striped wallet. 

Since I'm getting more into Japanese aesthetics, I also picked up a furoshiki. I'm planning to use it as a bag. 

I've been carrying a folding fan with me more often because of my growing interest in Japanese culture. 

I can really feel my age.

It's been a while since my last post... but today, let's talk about coffee! âœ¨  
.  
I've kept this a secret until now, but I really want to introduce you to an amazing coffee shop! (ï½€ï½¥Ï‰ï½¥Â´)  
.  
It's called SHIBACOFFEE (@shibacoffee) and it's located at the "Shin-Maruko" station on the Tokyu Toyoko Line.  
.  
I became a fan of this place after a friend recommended it to me for its delicious coffee (*Â´ê’³`*)  
.  
Basically, I usually buy beans from SHIBACOFFEE's online shop, but they also have a physical store where you can enjoy coffee! @akane_ban

It's been quite a while, but... I went to the Shaman King exhibition in Tokyo at the beginning of September.

I had been looking forward to this day for so long.

I was so moved that I didn't even know how to put it into words.

A rush of various emotions overflowed, and I was incredibly happy. I wanted to stay in that space forever.

I soaked in the afterglow for several days.

Leaf-kun's "It'll work out somehow" saved me countless times, and Shaman King inspired and pushed me forward.

With feelings unchanged from back then, I'm looking forward to whatâ€™s next!

en:
Quick trip back to Kobe! 

I finally got to visit the "PEANUTS Cafe" that I've always wanted to go to. 

I also stopped by the Snoopy Town Shop in Sannomiya and had a blast with all things Snoopy â˜ºï¸ Next time, I definitely want to stay at the PEANUTS HOTEL...! 

I was able to relax and spend time with my family and relatives. I've recharged my energy, so Iâ€™ll be back to working hard on my projects starting tomorrow! 

See you again, Kobe! 

#snoopy #peanuts #peanutscafekobe #peanutshotel #ã‚¹ãƒŒãƒ¼ãƒ”ãƒ¼ #ç¥æˆ¸

I also went to the "PEANUTS DINER" ğŸ´

My mom has always loved Snoopy, and I got influenced by her, so we were both super excited together! â£ï¸

I also bought the meal plate used at PEANUTS DINER Kobe â˜ºï¸â™ª

Wearing clothes from Yuka-chan's (@yukakokurosaka0606) brand @jour.de.muguet, I felt so happy surrounded by my favorite things ğŸ’˜

#jourdemuguet #snoopy #peanuts #peanutsdiner #ã‚¹ãƒŒãƒ¼ãƒ”ãƒ¼

I went to the STINGRAY 10th Anniversary limited-time shop! â˜ºï¸â™ª

Congratulations on your 10th anniversary! ğŸŠ

I finally got the running shorts I had my eye on~âœŒï¸ I wanted them for running and drumming, so I'm super happy to have gotten them!!!! 

Thank you, Rui-san (@ruihashimoto)!! Looking forward to more in the future!

#stingray #Shibuya

en:
About my hair po.

Recently, I changed my hair from purple to a bright red gradient ğŸ•Š Every time I get it maintained, the color is slightly different, but that's just how it goes.

The tips have always been red, so I don't plan on bleaching them.

For the inner part, Iâ€™ve got purple starting from the roots, so when it grows out, I bleach that part and add more color. If I want to increase the length of the color, I just get that part bleached a bit more.

Basically...

The first time I bought an expensive item for myself, it was a Fender bass.  
American Deluxe.  

I have so many memories with it~  
I donâ€™t know when, but Iâ€™m sure the time will come when I can play it loud again.  
Itâ€™s a bit worn out, but I still love the stickers on it.  

#bandmaid #fender #4strings

I heard that @watai_hair will be relocating and having a grand reopening on December 10, so I got my last hair maintenance done at this location!! 

Itâ€™s so comfortable that I always end up dozing off during the shampoo and blow-dry. (The photo is my just-woke-up face.)

Thank you for everything so far!! And I look forward to continuing with you!

Iâ€™m excited for the new shop! âœ¨

#watai #hairsalon

en: On December 13, 2020, a birthday surprise prank by the members and the BAND-MAID team took place at the online okyuji venue. The full version will be available later in the "OMEISYUSAMA-NO-KAI" ğŸ¥!!

This year's birthday was a parade of surprise pranks, and I was shocked to find out that the surprises started a week before my birthday!

1. A ton of KitKats in my bag
2. The stage drink was super carbonated water
3. A bunch of seaweed stems hidden behind the hi-hat (my favorite!)
4. The towel to wipe off sweat after the okyuji was piping hot
5. Kobato, who was supposed to be unable to join the Instagram Live, appeared the moment it hit midnight

The last surprise, "Kobato's appearance," was the biggest shock of all.

The members and everyone on the BAND-MAID team acted so well that I totally fell for it all.

It was an overwhelming and delightful surprise! ğŸ‰

en:
Tomorrow, BAND-MAID's "Unseen World" will finally be released! âœ¨  
.  
First of all, I'm so happy to hear all the wonderful feedback from our Masters and Princesses who have been listening to the early release. It brings me so much joy and a sense of relief. (*Â´ê’³`*)  
.  
But you know, there's just something special about CDs, isn't there? (*Â´ê’³`*)  
The thrill of opening it up...  
The excitement of the lyric booklet...  
And when there are bonus items, it makes it even more fun! ğŸ’•  
.  
And can you believe it? This will be our fourth album since our major debut!

en:
ğŸ•Š  
Today we released "about Us"! Surprised? It's a surprise! ğŸ•Š  

This song is packed with so many feelings. Actually, it was created for our performance at Nippon Budokan.  

During these challenging times with COVID, we truly feel every day that we can keep pushing forward because of our Masters and Princesses. We wanted to express this gratitude on the day of our Budokan performance, which is why we decided to create this song.  

Everyone is going through tough times, and the days can be hard, but...

en:
Hey everyone, how are you doing?  
We're doing really well!  
Even though the world has changed so much,  
we want everyone to feel joy, healing, and energy, even if just a little bit. With that feeling in mind, we're excited to share a song called "about Us" with you.  
It'll be available from 2/4, and we want everyone around the world to listen to it.  

This song is filled with our current feelings.  
The world suddenly entered a state of "COVID-19 pandemic,"  
and we've been thinking a lot about what brings everyone joy.

en:
New Song "about Us"

A surprise from BAND-MAID. 
Did you receive it well? 

This song was created with the hope of delivering it to everyone on the day of our performance at Nippon Budokan. 
It's a very special song filled with strong feelings of gratitude and love that we want to convey. 

The reason we can keep moving forward like this is all thanks to our Masters and Princesses who always support us. 

Being able to release so many songs, perform for everyone around the world, and announce our Budokan performance is all possible because of the support from all of you. 

Thank you for your support!

Weâ€™ve just released a new song called "about Us"! 
It was a sudden surprise, but have you had a chance to listen to it yet? 
.
Actually, this song was originally created with the intention of performing it at Budokan! 
.
When we announced Budokan, 
our Masters and Princesses were so incredibly happy. 
.
I truly felt that being able to stand on that stage is all thanks to your support! 
.
So, we all strongly felt the desire to express our gratitude to our Masters and Princesses, and thatâ€™s what inspired this song. ğŸ¶

en:
Thank you for the online okyuji! 

Today, we unveiled a brand new guitar, the #zemaitis, which is none other than Kobato's signature model ğŸ•Š. The designer, Takeuchi-san (@adesigner), perfectly captured Kobato's vision and designed it in the coolest way possible. We also got to indulge in some requests for the body from Zemaitis, and it turned out amazing!

I'll write more details about it later ğŸ•Š.

Wow, it was such an incredibly fun time! Thank you so much!!!! Today was...

February 11, 2021. A very important day that was supposed to be at Nippon Budokan.

I was so happy that on such an important day, I could serve you all online and share the same moment together. It really made me feel that the moments spent serving are the most fun and fulfilling!

I could feel that all the Masters and Princesses around the world were "enjoying this moment together," and I could see everyone right in front of me!!!!!!

I performed with the same feelings as if I were serving at Budokan!!!! 

I could feel that way thanks to all of you!

Thank you for coming home to our online okyuji yesterday! (*Â´ê’³`*)

Even though we still have some days ahead where we can't meet in person, I hope we can bring you some energy and healing through our streamsâœ¨âœ¨

My beloved ğŸ’• Nana-chan (@7.style) and Yuuki-chan (@yuki.1754) came to visitâ£ï¸

I got to be pampered by Yuuki-chan (*Â´Ï‰`*)ğŸ’•

Hehehe~ ğŸ’•ğŸ’•ğŸ’• I'm so grateful for the lovely treatmentğŸ¥²ğŸ’• 
(The photo is from after the live show ğŸˆ)

I've been super busy...

Alright! Before February ends, I need to update you all about my birthday (it was on 2/8) and, honestly, I really need to update my Instagram too! 

So here it goes! 

For my birthday, we had a rehearsal, and the members and staff celebrated with me! Thank you so much! 
(Last year, we also had a rehearsal the day before my birthday, and they celebrated then too!)

This was my first time being celebrated in such a sparkly and cute way! Look at these balloons! So shiny! âœ¨

Thank you to all the Masters and Princesses for your warm birthday wishes! I feel so lucky! ğŸ’–

The May issue of "Player" magazine featuring BAND-MAID will be on sale
en:
Today, April 2nd (Friday), the May issue of "Player" magazine featuring BAND-MAID will be released! 

It's the first time a girls' band has graced the cover of Player, and I couldn't be happier! At the same time, it strengthens my desire to continue growing into a band worthy of being on the cover.

It's such an honor.

We had a really fun long interview and photoshoot, so stay tuned!

en:
I just visited the Haikyuu!! exhibition in Nagoya!

I made sure to engrave it in my memory.

I couldn't stop feeling emotional~ 

Especially the original drawings of my favorite scenes had me in tears... it was amazing...

Haikyuu has a story for each character that resonates so deeply, and every character is so relatable and full of humanity, I respect them all.

Having friends is wonderful. Youth is wonderful.

I believe there are many similarities between sports and music, and I've gained so much power from Haikyuu.

This might be the first time I've become so obsessed with an anime and manga as an adult.

Everyone, thank you for watching the online okyuji for Maid Day last night!

Maybe I should have a drink.

en:
I went to the "My Hero Academia Exhibition DROWING SMASH" with Baziru-chan (@kazi_baziru)! 

We both dashed in after work and barely made it just in time for the final day...!

The exhibition area was incredibly luxurious and fulfilling; I was moved the entire time.

Our favorites are Todoroki-kun and Toga-chan.

Since talking was prohibited inside the venue, we communicated our joy and emotions through gestures ğŸ¤

I was so happy to go with Baziru-chan!!!! Thank you ğŸ’

Iâ€™ll do my best to become a hero too!

en:
I'm excited to announce that we've been chosen to perform the opening theme for the TV anime "Platinum End"! 

I've been a fan of Platinum End even before we got the opportunity to work on the opening theme, so I've been eagerly looking forward to the anime adaptation.

I'm truly happy to be involved with a work that I love as a fan.

Starting today, "Sense (TV Size Ver.)" is available for early streaming!

We've packed it full of phrases that capture the exhilarating feel and world of the series.

I hope you'll pay attention to the lyrics as well.

"Sense"
Please give it a listen! ğŸ‘¼

en:
ğ“‰

With colored contacts and bold makeup, I can create a flashy look! 
And I also love my bare face, which is plain and lacks energy. 

But somehow, I feel most at home with black. 
Maybe Iâ€™m just loved by black. 
Recently, I thought I might actually look good in blue too. 
But then I realized Iâ€™ve got a blue something stuck to my head... 

Last night, I listened to some really wonderful music and felt like I became wonderful myself. 
Iâ€™m still feeling great today!

Hereâ€™s a behind-the-scenes shot from the photoshoot for the May issue of "Player."

When we were shooting with the instruments, I chose the bass drum.

Of course, it ended up being the snare for the actual performance.

Thank you to the photographer and staff who took the commemorative photos! (Sorry for always goofing around!)

en:
October 21st  
Celebrating my 810th birthday for the 9th time! My friends threw me a little party ğŸ•Š  

And guess what? The cake was in cluppo style!!  
They even had a sign for the cluppo version of Mikuffi!! I was so surprised, it was amazing!!  

Oh, and I tried Kobato for the first time in my life!! ğŸ’¦  
It was soft and delicious, but my feelings are a bit complicated...!  

Also! I wanted to fly high in the sky, so I rode in a helicopter! Even though I'm a pigeon.  
I got to see the beautiful sunset!  

It was a wonderful birthday filled with so many great moments!

en:
12.25  
Thank you for joining our acoustic stream! ğŸ•Š  
Iâ€™m sure many of you were surprised by the different arrangements and compositions compared to our usual performances!  

This time, Kobato did an acoustic arrangement of "Sayonakidori" for the first time! I was really nervous! ğŸ•Š  

Since it was a Christmas version, I wore special casual clothes instead of the maid outfit for this okyuji! So rare!!! If you'd like, check out Kobato's full outfit too!

Thank you everyone for watching the acoustic live today! 

Hereâ€™s a photo where we look unusually happy! 

That bright red outfit! So fresh~! 

Iâ€™m glad we had such a fun Christmas! 

Please continue to support BAND-MAID! 

#bandmaid #acoustic

Acoustic okyuji outfitsâ£ï¸

When it came to choosing outfits other than our maid costumes, I was determined to wear something from @panormo_official.

Since the clothes are made by our violinist Yuki-chan (@hanaiyuki), they are filled with thoughtful details that make it easy for performers to play, and I found it really comfortable to drum in them!

I was so happy to wear my favorite outfit on such a special okyuji day!

It was so much fun to decide on the theme color for the outfits and coordinate everything together with the members, so I hope we can do it again someday!

en:
I had a great time with the kids during the acoustic okyuji! ğŸ¥

I finally got to try out the La Rosa Percussion cajÃ³n that I've been curious about for a while.

It was my first time playing it, and I was blown away by how amazing it sounded! So moving!

The bass and treble were perfectly balanced, making it feel really good to play.

The seating was comfortable too~ 

I wonder how many years it's been since I played cajÃ³n with BAND-MAID...? It was so much fun to play again after such a long time!

For the drum set, I used a TAMA small-diameter kit.

It's been a while since I played with a single pedal too!

en:
âœ§

This is the casual outfit I wore during the "BAND-MAID ONLINE ACOUSTIC" streamed on Christmas! 

I had so much fun coordinating with a beige and red theme... It was nice to step away from the usual monochrome maid outfits and go for softer colors! I hope the balance of beige and red helps convey each member's personality as well... 

For example, I thought MISA-chan would look great with more red~ and Iâ€™d love to see KANAMI-chan in a beige leaning towards brown~ and for Kobato, I think a lot of beige with deep red would be nice too~ Shifu!

en:
2022.6.5  
predia Final Live ~Thank you for all my dia~ @ Tachikawa Stage Garden  

I was able to witness predia's Final Live in its entirety.  

From the first time I met them until the very end, predia shone brightly the whole time. It was dazzling.  

Their powerful and beautiful stage presence left me in tears throughout the performance. When I saw the six of them together, I cried even harder.  

No matter how many years go by, they still warmly embrace me and say, "Aww, A-chan!" with such kindness.

en:
ğŸ•ŠğŸŒâ¤ï¸

It's been a little while, but on July 7th, Tanabata, cluppo's "With you" was released! 

It's the ending theme for the TV anime "Sakiu Arusunotoria Sun!"âœ¨ 
This is cluppo's first anime tie-up!

I hope you enjoy this song, singing style, and vibe, which are all different from what you've heard from cluppo before, thanks to the tie-up. Please support the anime too! ğŸ•Š The music video is also available on YouTube!

This was the first MV where I didn't hold a guitar!

The two days of the dress rehearsal are over.  
That feeling of exhaustion after giving it your all is so nostalgic.  

Just a little longer until we can meet everyone!

en:
ğŸ•Šâ™ªâ™ªâ™ª

It's finally begun!  
PRE US OKYUJI IN JAPAN  
The first day is at Osaka Namba Hatch.

Can you believe it's been about 3 years?  
I feel like Urashima Taro...  
Time flies, but thanks for waiting!

I was filled with a mix of nervousness and happiness,  
a long-lost feeling.  
The okyuji was a bit different from before COVID,  
but having our Masters and Princesses come home  
and being able to see each other made it truly wonderful.

I hope you enjoyed the long-awaited silly MC and the magic time too!  

OMJ towel!

2022.8.17  
PRE US OKYUJI @ Namba Hatch  
Thank you so much for the first day in Osaka!  

I was really, really happy to see everyone after 2 and a half years of performing without an audience! Thank you for waiting for us!!  

I was so excited about Osaka that I ended up eating 3 packs of takoyaki (sauce, salt, ponzu) and 2 551s before the show, and as a result, my stomach is completely stuffed since I have a sagging stomach.  
*Before eating (4th photo) â†’ After eating (5th photo)*  

This is the fear of our new outfits that I talked about during the MC.  

I feel like I'm about to get seriously scolded, so I need to be careful before the okyuji and photo shoots!
#bandmaid #summersonic2022 #Samasoni

en:
ğŸ•ŠğŸŒ»

Before I knew it, September has arrived! 
Our performance at Summer Sonic was a blast, and we just wrapped up our okyuji in Nagoya! ğŸ•Š

I really feel the joy of performing every time. 
(For the Nagoya show, I got a bit too pumped up during the "Rinne" part and ended up shaking my head way too much. The next day, my neck was definitely not functioning properly! ğŸ˜‚)

Tomorrow, we have our okyuji in Sendai! 
Letâ€™s go all out! ğŸ•Š

And donâ€™t forget, on the 21st of this month, our new EP "Unleash" will be released! 
Itâ€™s a strong and very "us" kind of album, so make sure to pre-order it! ğŸ•Š
Be kind!

en:
Yesterday was an okyuji in Sendai!  
Thank you so much!  

BAND-MAID, who usually doesn't run late, ended up being 20 minutes behind schedule, haha.  
I'm really sorry for keeping everyone waiting.  
But...  
It was a great time nonetheless.  

I felt so much love that night.  
Our bond as members has deepened even more!  
(For some reason, Sai-chan's skirt's outer frills were missing, so we all panicked and ended up cutting and sewing fabric to make it, haha.)  

Yeah. It was a wonderful night!!  

Here's a photo of us drinking beer and striking a GOOD pose.  

#bandmaid

en:
2022.9.3  
PRE US OKYUJI @ Sendai Rensa  
Third show, Sendai! Thank you so much!  

There was a little hiccup right before the performance, but the unity and bond of the members and staff shone through, making this okyuji a valuable experience and a wonderful memory.  

Sorry for keeping you waiting...!  
I'm grateful for the warmth of our Masters and Princesses.  

Thanks to everyone, it turned into the most intense okyuji ever!!! It was so much fun!!!  

Let's hang out again soon!!  

Next up is Zepp DiverCity TOKYO!  
Weâ€™re looking forward to seeing you there~ â˜ºï¸  

Oh. One last thing...

If we were to do an okyuji in Miyagi Prefecture, the setting of Haikyuu!!, it would definitely turn out like this!

Hereâ€™s a pic of me during the venue rehearsal.

There are some staff members in the BAND-MAID team who love Haikyuu, so we were all super hyped up! 
(Thanks to the lighting crew, we got some awesome photos!)

#Haikyuuâ€¼ï¸ #Haikyuu #OikawaToru
After the okyuji in Sendai, I stayed in Sendai and went on a Haikyuu!! tour.

Finally made my long-awaited pilgrimage to the sacred site at Kamei Arena Sendai (Sendai City Gymnasium)! 

I was so excited to see the scenery just like in the manga and anime. It was truly moving... 

I can't post pictures of the sculptures since photography is not allowed, but they were way bigger than I imagined...!! 

I definitely want to visit Karumai Town someday! 

Miyagi is such a wonderful place. I want to take my time and visit again. 

#Haikyuu!! #Haikyuu #Pilgrimage

Osaka, Nagoya, Sendai, TÅno...

We even got to take a photo with The Pretty Reckless!

ğŸ•Š  
Before we knew it, it's already the end of the year! This year, we were able to do something Christmas-y ğŸ„, so here's a little share!  

I celebrated the birthday of my dear friend Miyu-chan @raita_miyu, who always gets along well with Kobato, and we had a pre-Christmas dinner together. The third photo was secretly taken without me knowing, lol. Can you believe we've been friends for about 10 years now?  

On the 25th, I celebrated with Etopiko @eto444_ as usual, combining birthday celebrations and Christmas! Spending Christmas with Etopiko has become a tradition now. ğŸ•ŠğŸ•Š

Happy New Year 2023!

In 2022, we were able to perform in front of an audience for the first time in a while and even went on a US Tour. It felt like a year where we could unleash all the pent-up energy! This year marks a significant milestone for BAND-MAID as we celebrate our 10th anniversary. We want to make it the best year ever! ğŸ•Š

Thank you all for your continued support this year as well!

en:
January 9, 2023

It was truly, truly a fun night.

I hope my feelings were conveyed through the music.

During the performance, I experienced emotions I've never felt before. I'm really grateful to have a life where I can feel such things.

It was a night like that.

I love everyone! I want to express my feelings to each and every one of you.

It looks like I'll be able to stand on stage a lot this year, so I'm really looking forward to it.

Here's to a great year for BAND-MAID as we celebrate our 10th anniversary in 2023!

#bandmaid

New bass

I asked the boss of BLACK CLOUD, who has been taking care of us again this time, to create a design I thought of, and he perfectly recreated it, resulting in a super cool, handsome-looking bass! Itâ€™s a Jaguar shape, 5-string, with PJ pickups.

Yesterday, I suddenly used it from the first song, so I think many of you were like, "Huh?" Hereâ€™s the introduction! ğŸº

#bandmaid

Hey there! How's everyone doing?  
You can really smell spring in the air~  
When it gets warm, I feel so much more active!  

Sorry for the late introduction, but hereâ€™s the color variation of the bass I posted last time.  
It's a rare Sonic Blue! After getting the relic finish done, it turned out really cool.  

I've been using it for practice and recording.  

The more I play it, the better it sounds!

en:
ğŸ•ŠğŸ•Š  
Sorry for the delay, but our 10th Anniversary Tour has finally begun!  

First up is the Kyushu leg. We kicked things off in Kobato's beloved hometown of Kumamoto, then moved on to Kagoshima and Fukuoka for our performances.  

In Kumamoto, Kobato's super nervous "Kobato Time" is still a bit embarrassing for me, haha. But no matter when I return, the warmth of Kyushu is just the best! ğŸ•Š  

Thank you all for the full SOLD OUT shows!  

2023.3.23 Kumamoto B.9 V1 from the 1st to the 3rd show  
3.25 Kagoshima CAPARVO HALL from the 4th to the 7th show

en:
ğŸ•ŠğŸ•Š  
After Kyushu, it's time for the Kansai edition!  
Heading to Kobe, Kyoto, and Osaka.  

Kobe is A-chan's hometown ğŸŒ  
Kyoto is, needless to say, Kobato's favorite place ğŸµ  
And Osaka is Sai-chan's Hanshin Tigers ğŸ¯  
So it looks like we had a blast here too!!  

In Kyoto, we know everyone was eagerly waiting for  
BAND-MAIKO's appearance,  
but unfortunately, that didn't happen.  
However, with great respect,  
we performed the BAND-MAID version, meaning the original songs,  
from BAND-MAIKO's album ğŸ•Š  

I thought this in Kyushu too,  
but after all...

en:
This year, I've celebrated my birthday! âœ¨ğŸ’“  
Thank you so much for all the birthday messages! âœ¨  
I'll work hard on creating songs that bring happiness to everyone, as well as on my guitar skills!!!  

This year, BAND-MAID is celebrating our 10th anniversary! ğŸ’“  
With just 2 months to go until our show at Yokohama Arena on 11/26, I want to grow as much as I can!!  

Today is my birthday!  
Thank you for always supporting me.  

I'll do my best to bring happiness to everyone!

Before I knew it, my messy hair has been growing more and more! 
I guess it's time to say goodbye to my straight long hair for a while. 
I actually quite like it, you know~ 

It feels like it suits my age, haha!

I was celebrated for my birthday during the Takamatsu performanceâœ¨âœ¨

This Koji Koji cake is amazingâ€¦!!âœ¨âœ¨
I was so happyâ˜ºï¸

Today, I'm serving in AkitağŸ’•
So excited! Looking forward to itâ€¦!!

#bandmaid

On the 28th, it was KANAMI's birthday ğŸ¸  
Happy Birthday! ğŸ¥³ğŸ‚  

It was so much fun celebrating together! I laughed at how we even prepared masks, lol.  

Thanks to the songs KANAMI creates, I get to grow every day! Always grateful!  

A few years ago, we were talking about how we've known each other for over 10 yearsâ€”time flies, right? But it's been 10 years since we formed the band! That's even more surprising!  

From here on out...

We've been together for over 10 years, but she's still like a cute little baby, precious as ever ğŸ‘¶.  
Always healing me and making me laugh!

en:
Thank you so much for Yokohama Arena on November 26, 2023! It was truly a dream come true to perform at Yokohama Arena, and I had such a happy time.

Being able to spend the last 10 years as BAND-MAID with these five members is all thanks to the support of so many people.

The BAND-MAID team is filled with warm and kind individuals who always listen to me and offer advice with genuine care. They can also be strict and straightforward when needed. It's because of this team that we've been able to grow so much. I can only express my gratitude. I love everyone in the BAND-MAID team so much... Iâ€™ll keep doing my best from here on out!

en:
BAND-MAID 10TH ANNIVERSARY TOUR FINAL  
2023.11.26 @ YOKOHAMA ARENA  

Thank you, Yokohama Arena!  

This is the place where I first watched a live concert and discovered the greatness of bands.  

Itâ€™s filled with memories of my youth, where I started drumming with a big dream and goal to someday stand on this stage.  

Iâ€™m truly happy and grateful to have stood on the Yokohama Arena stage with BAND-MAID.  

For someone like me, who easily gets fired up and then cools down, itâ€™s incredible that Iâ€™ve been in this band for 10 years!

en:
Hey everyone, do you like Advent calendars? I love them! 

This year, I got the LEGO STAR WARS Advent Calendar, and I'm having a blast opening a little window every day and building the pieces. I'm even playing battles with them! 

From the start, I've been anxiously wondering, "Is Palpatine coming yet?" I can't wait to see the special Christmas costume! I really want to see it! I wonder if it's going to show up at the very end. What do you think? 

#bandmaid

en:
Good evening~ The year is almost over, isnâ€™t it? 

This year, we kicked off our 10th anniversary tour at GARDEN THEATER and traveled to many places. Iâ€™ve been cherishing each performance, making sure to remember every single one as I played my guitarâ€¦ and I truly believe it was a year that reminded me just how amazing live shows are ğŸ¥²

After the tour finale at Yokohama Arena, Iâ€™ve set various new goals and have more songs I want to create!

Iâ€™d be so happy if you could look forward to next year as well!

Oh! By the way, the re-broadcast of the tour finale at Yokohama Arena is alsoâ€¦

2023 11.26  
Yokohama Arena  

Thank you for all the first-time views and the first-time arena okyuji!  
I felt so many emotions today. I'll definitely be back to Yokohama Arena!  
Next time, let's make it SOLD OUT!  

#bandmaid #10thanniversary  
#memories

en:
[Apology and Announcement to Everyone]  
We would like to inform you that the FLAG LS-T that will be sold at today's KT Zepp Yokohama performance has some incorrect back prints due to a manufacturing error.  
After discussions among the members and staff, we have decided to proceed with the sale as a special item for today only.  
The correct design will be available for sale at our online shop at a later date.  
The image of Kobato Miku wearing the item features one of the incorrect back print designs that will be sold today.  
Thank you for your understanding.  
#band

en:
2024.2.22  
BAND-MAID 10TH ANNIV. TOUR Spin-Off Okyuji  
@ KT Zepp Yokohama  

Thank you for starting off 2024 with the best okyuji!!  

This time, since it was a spin-off okyuji from Yokohama Arena, we focused on delivering the songs that couldn't fit into the setlist!  

If we had included all the songs that were considered for Yokohama Arena, it would have ended up being over 50 songs... so we sadly had to say goodbye to some in the setlist.  

I'm really happy we could deliver this in the form of a "spin-off"! ğŸ˜Š

February 22 was Cat Day, wasn't it? ğŸˆ Here's a photo of MISA transforming back from a cat to a human. 

Photo by @pickles_0808 

#bandmaid

en:
Thank you for the acoustic okyuji! 

It was so much fun to do an acoustic set after a long time. 

The sounds and voices from the members felt like they wrapped around me, and it was really comfortable to play. Everyone's applause resonated with such warm sounds. 

The stage setup was amazing, right? ğŸŒ³ It felt like we were performing in the middle of a forest, such a magical atmosphere. 

I was really happy to spend such a wonderful time with everyone!

en:
ğ“‡ 

"I was thinking, 'March is going to be an acoustic okyuji, I'm so nervous!' and then it hit me after it was all over. I was so focused, almost lost in the moment, facing the keyboard. Imagining everyone's soft expressions. Just leaving those words behind.

My energy comes solely from everyone's reactions. I hope you enjoyed it, and I hope we can share wonderful times together, seeing new sights from now on. Just leaving those words behind too.

During the okyuji, I changed up my approach to the songs to make the words resonate even more."

I'll be sharing memories from the acoustic live little by little. 

It was such a wonderful set, wasn't it? 

I sometimes think it would be nice to see ourselves performing from the audience's perspective. (But that's impossible for life!) 

Thank you all so much!! 

ğŸ“· @pickles_0808

en:
2024.3.20  
BAND-MAID ACOUSTIC OKYUJI

We were finally able to hold an acoustic okyuji with an audience in a wonderful space after such a long time! 

With album production going on, we were juggling a lot, but we started preparing right after Yokohama Arena! 

Acoustic arrangements are challenging, but they allow us to express ourselves in a way that's different from our usual style, which is really interesting and addictive... 

If possible, Iâ€™d love to do this once a year... â™¡ 

Iâ€™m so happy if you felt comfortable and were able to relax! â™¡  
Thank you for coming home!

en:
Hello everyone, it's been a while! ğŸ•Š  
This is cluppo.  
I'm excited to share that I've participated as a vocal artist in the MV project for the mobile game Touhou LostWord!  
I'm honored that the lyrics reflect my style as well! â™¡  
The artwork for the MV by Koto Hata is super cute!  
It's a pigeon mask! ğŸ•ŠğŸ•Š  
I hope you all get to see and listen to this cool and stylish song!  

And tomorrow, on the 30th, Touhou LostWord will celebrate its 4th anniversary!  
A momentous day!

en:
2024.5.1  
INCUBUS ASIA TOUR 2024 in JAPAN  

We had the honor of performing as a SPECIAL GUEST at the INCUBUS concert!  

During our okyuji, we debuted our co-written song "Bestie" with Mike Einziger, who played guitar for us. It felt like a dream come true.  

As we played together as a six-member band, countless memories from my encounters with Mikey and our co-writing period flooded back, and my heart swelled with emotion.  

Thank you to everyone at INCUBUS!

Maid Day  
I love drinking beer and live shows!  

It seems that this is the first time in 5 years that we have an audience for Maid Day, and it was so much fun!  

The setlist was insane, so I just let loose and had a blast, haha!  
The setlist was too strong; it was such a good time.  

I feel like I've leveled up again.  

Ah, I want to do more live shows!  
It's just not enough!!!

en:
Alright, it has arrived!

The BLACK SMOKER MISA model!!!!!!!

What impressed me the most is that even though it's a Shige signature, it has relic processing and a carved pickguard. It's amazing! It's almost identical to my own bass. The level of craftsmanship is really high, and it sounds fantastic, so I might use it as my main bass for live shows. First, I'll use it for recording and play it a lot at home to get it well-acquainted.

As always... I was really particular about the design of this bass, and they made it just as I requested!

The case is cool too!

en:
2024.06.12  
BAND-MAID Ã— The Warning" Special Show in Japan

It became an unforgettable day...  
After talking about "Let's do a live show together," it really came true!  
We even created songs together and performed as eight people.  
With the power of all eight of us, we ended up making an incredibly rockin' song...!!  
(Those who saw it and those who couldn't are probably eager to hear it, right? Please look forward to it!)

Since spending time together from June 1st, I've grown to love Dany, Pau, and Ale so much, and when the live ended, I couldn't stop the tears of loneliness...

Memories with The Warning â˜ºï¸  
During the production period, we got really into anime talks and had some otaku fun, plus we went out for ramen and yakiniku! I went for ramen with Dany three times ğŸœ  

Everyone gifted us cute dolls and sweets from Mexico! They chose them with the five of us in mind! I'm so happy...!  

I'm cherishing them on display. Graciasâ™¥ï¸  

#bandmaid #thewarning

I was invited to the premiere screening of the TV anime "Grendizer U" and got to watch the first episode!

The intense battle scenes and story development kept me on the edge of my seat the whole time. Before I knew it, the main episode was over, and I was moved by the connection between the ending visuals and the song... my emotions were all over the place!

I want to elevate the project along with the ending theme "Protect You"!

It starts airing on July 5, 2024 (Friday)!

And on the same day, July 5, the digital release of "Protect You" has been confirmed!

Teaser visuals and the artwork for the distribution jacket will also be revealed!

"BAND-MAID HALL TOUR 2024" @ Nagoya City Hall  

The hall tour has begunãƒ¼ãƒ¼ãƒ¼ãƒ¼!  
Thank you, Nagoya, for an amazing first day!  

We kicked off with a bang right from the start. I feel like I saw Kanami's awakening after a long time. It was incredible. LOL  

A round of applause for everyone in the venue for their great energy and responsiveness!  
We had so much fun! We laughed a lot!  

We're coming at you with a setlist full of confidence this time too.  
There are many new challenges, and it's packed with excitement.

2024.7.5  
"BAND-MAID HALL TOUR 2024" @ Fenice Sakai Large Hall  

Thank you, Osaka!  

The sunny girl power really showed, and the weather was too nice! (Scorching heat)  
The energy from everyone at the venue was incredible! So hot~  

Iâ€™m satisfied that we got to talk about our love for anime.  

What an intense day, it was psychoooooo!!  

Can you guess the pose in the group photo?  
Itâ€™s something the members love, that and that.  
We had a feast in Osaka!  

Next up is the tour finale at Kanagawa Prefectural Hall!  

The place of my youthful days in school.  
The wind ensemble competition...

To me, who played the trombone in middle and high school:

This summer of 2024, instead of a concert competition, I got to stand on the stage of Kanagawa Prefectural Hall for BAND-MAID's hall tour!

I'm back in Kanaken! My dream of returning as a drummer has come true.

Congratulations to me! Thank you, everyone!

I'm so glad I continued with music!

Thank you all for coming today despite the bad weather.

We look forward to your continued support for BAND-MAID!

en:
Our new album "Epic Narratives" will be released on September 25th, so we're gradually introducing the songs! â™¡

06-Bestie

I had the honor of co-writing this with Mike Einziger from INCUBUS. It's such a privilege to have this opportunity thanks to a festival... Mikey is truly kind and has a wonderful ability to make everyone around him smile naturally. He came to visit us, shared so many stories, and gave us tons of ideas. And this time, "Bestie" is inspired by what Mikey shared with us!
The other day, I got my hair all nice and pretty thanks to the reliable Koori-san! ğŸ•Š @icemankoori

Looks like it's already reserved?? ğŸ•Š  
We're also looking forward to serving you!

The new album "Epic Narratives" is set to release on September 25th! Just a little longer now~ ğŸ¥¹ I'm so excited!!! We're gradually introducing the songs too~ â™¡

07 - Brightest Star
It's been a while since we had a Kobato song! I created this with the theme of "the poppy me," aiming to highlight Kobato's cuteness! During the okyuji, Kobato takes the lead on the guitar solo, and I would be so happy if we could play it together~ â™¡ 
It's super fun to play with lots of cutting, and since it's a Kobato song, it turned into a playful track that really shines! Have any of you already heard it during the okyuji?

Since this song has a lot of twists and turns, I think the impression will change dramatically when you listen to it all the way through.  

I can't wait to see everyone's reactions!  

Only a little bit longer until the release of "Epic Narratives" on 9/25!!!!

en:
2024.8.30  
"BAND-MAID Spin-Off Okyuji Medium in Summer" @Spotify O-EAST  

What an incredibly fun summer memory!  

Thank you to everyone who came to hang out and to all the Masters who watched the exclusive stream!  

We focused on medium-tempo songs. It was refreshing, right? You were moved, weren't you?  

I was soaking in the end of summer while watching the stream.  

It turned into a special okyuji that you can only experience in a spin-off.  

The next spin-off okyuji will be in Fukuoka and Sapporo.  
We can definitely do spin-offs in the regions too!

Tonight, we're continuing to introduce our new album "Epic Narratives," which will be released on September 25th! â™¡

10-Memorable
I created this melody during our US tour. It was such a joy to perform in front of an audience again after a long time and to see everyone's smiles from the stage... I was truly happy. I wanted to capture that warm feeling, and now I'm even happier to share this song with everyone during our performances.

During the shows, Kobato plays the acoustic guitar, and I sing until we get to the chorus.

I hope everyone can join in and sing along to the melody at the beginning of the intro, so please remember it! â™ª  
We've performed it a few times during our okyuji too!  
The short guitar phrases in the intro have such a lively feel, and I really enjoy playing the short phrases in the B section as well! â™¡â™¡

en:
Weâ€™ve released "Epic Narratives" on 9/25! ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ğŸ‰

This album, which we poured our hearts into over three and a half years, is incredibly deep. Each song carries a heavy emotional weight.

I remember getting really excited during the demo stage of "Toi et moi," imagining how we would perform it live. The bass line is simple, but I made sure it sticks in your ears along with the sound. Itâ€™s fun to play!

In short... itâ€™s one of my favorite songs! 

I just played it during practice, so check it out when you have some free time! 

#b

Encountering a BAND-MAID taxi.  
When I tried to imitate it, Sai-chan gave me a good punch ğŸ•Š lol  
It didn't hurt, so I'm okay!  
Just another usual day!

Today, September 25th, our new album "Epic Narratives" has been released! âœ¨ Clap, clap, clap! ğŸ‘

To all the Masters and Princesses who have been waiting for the new songs that we haven't performed during our okyuji yet, it's finally time! â™¡

Starting tonight, we'll be introducing the new tracks! â™¡

08. Letters to you  
I believe that when you're living each day to the fullest, there can be tough times, exhausting moments, and times when you feel down.  
During those times, I wanted to create a song that resonates with your heart and can be by your side as you listen to it.  

Sai-chan is listening to the song...

en:
On September 25th, our new album "Epic Narratives" was released!! Have you listened to it yet? ğŸ’šğŸ’š

Tonight, I'll be introducing a song ğŸ«¶

9. The one  
This song was actually created after I was asked, "What if you made a song for the last performance at Yokohama Arena?" Although we didn't end up performing it there, I thought, if it were to be our last, I wouldn't have any regrets! 

Eternity might not exist, but I believe that as long as the connections between people continue, that is what truly matters.

en:
On September 25th, our new album "Epic Narratives" was released! â™¡  
We still have a few more songs to introduce... We've created so many! ğŸ¥¹  

12 - Toi et moi  
This track features a powerful riff typical of BAND-MAID, with a slightly dark vibe. I thought it was essential to have a song like this on the album, so I worked on it!  
We went through several variations of the riff before settling on this one, and I envisioned the guitar shouting along with Kobato's initial shout.  
The guitar solo is designed to be easy to copy while also being fun to play!

Today was my birthday~ ğŸ’šğŸ’šğŸ’š

Thank you so much for all the birthday messages, everyone!!

I celebrated with the members a little while ago with a "Album Release Celebration!" dinner ğŸ¥‚ğŸ’•

There's nothing better than being able to enjoy delicious food slowly without worrying about anything, and spending time with members who can make me laugh with silly stories~ ğŸ«¶

And today, I got to relax at MISA-chan's houseâ™¡â™¡ 
For the past few years, my birthdays have been filled with work and deadlines... so this has been the most relaxing birthday ever!

14-Get to the top
SAIKIå…ˆç”Ÿã‹ã‚‰ã€ã‚„ã¯ã‚Šã‚¢ãƒ«ãƒãƒ æ›²ã«ã¯ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆæ›²ãŒå¿…è¦ã ã¨è¨€ã‚ã‚Œã€ä»Šå›ã®ã‚¢ãƒ«ãƒãƒ ã§æœ€å¾Œã«ä½œã£ãŸæ›²ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã—ãŸï¼

en:
On September 25th, our new album "Epic Narratives" was released! â™¡ As for the song introductions, we're taking a little break this time...!! (You'll find out why soon... â™¡)

14 - Get to the top  
SAIKI-sensei told us that an instrumental track is essential for the album, so this became the last song we created for it! Since the previous instrumental track "from now on" had a dark rock vibe, I wanted to go in the completely opposite direction this time, making the melody line brighter... Itâ€™s like experiencing the thrill of a circus, a song that makes your heart dance!

en:
BAND-MAID / The music video for "Forbidden tale" has been released!

We had the opportunity to shoot in a wonderful location, and the beautiful MV has been completed ğŸ¥¹

We've been introducing the songs from our new album "Epic Narratives," which was released on September 25, and this will be the final introduction with "Forbidden tale"!

05 - Forbidden tale
The theme of "life" and "what it means to live" is the biggest theme we've tackled in BAND-MAID's history. It's been a journey of three and a half years, and during that time, we've thought a lot about...
So cute... ğŸ¥º
I thought MISA-chan was smoking a cigarette, but it was actually a candy! ğŸ¬

What?! LOL  
That's hilarious! ğŸ˜‚

en:
It's the first time I've played the nostalgic black bass in this outfit. It feels quite sentimental. I used this one for a ballad and a mid-tempo song this time. When I compared it to my main yellow JB, which has a sharp and edgy sound, the black bass had a calm low end with a strong, rounded, and gentle tone. I also used my signature PJ as usual.

Each one has a different character, which is really interesting! BAND-MAID has such a wide range of songs, so it's great for switching up basses.

Thank you everyone for the Zepp tour!!!!!!!!!

I'm still in the process of creating, and the bass... ğŸ¸

en:
The other day, I went to Billboard Tokyo to see The Verbs. Steve Jordan's drumming was absolutely insane and I couldn't get enough of it. I went alone, but I was having so much fun... I was genuinely excited inside my heart.

My mom has always passionately said, "Really! The groove is so incredible, it feels like the drums could stop at any moment!" and now I truly understand what she meant.

It was a happy moment finally getting to see them.

Okuda Tamio, who focused on guitar in this band, was also amazing~ I love his singing voice and sense too!

The other day, Iâ€™m sharing a memory photo from when I had drinks with TOKIE and Ichiro Yoshida. 

As always, conversation is the best accompaniment to drinks. 

It was a happy momentâ€¦ Thank you, and see you again! 

#bandmaid #tokie #yoshidaichirountouchableworld

Today, I celebrated my birthday! ğŸ‚ Thank you so much for all the warm birthday messages! I read them every year with so much emotion! 

This year, the members celebrated at MISA's house! 

They prepared a ton of my favorite food and cake, and I received flowers and a necklace from everyone. I'm really so happy! I'll cherish them forever! 

I'll make sure to keep the cute Christmas bouquet fresh and displayed until the 25th! â›„ï¸ğŸ„ğŸ’ 

Spending my birthday slowly with the members was such a joy! â˜ºï¸ 

Iâ€™ll always keep my goals and dreams alive!

Memory Post ğŸ•Š  
2024.11.25 ZEPP TOUR 2024  
ZEPP HANEDA Day 1  

Day 1 of the tour finale ğŸ•Š  
It was so much fun to return to ZEPP HANEDA on Maid Day, filled with our Masters and Princesses!  
After finishing the first day, just thinking about doing it all again tomorrow makes me so happy and fired up!  

I tried a new hair color and length for this, but Sai-chan called me a puppy instead of Kobato, and I was totally flustered!  

The first photo is from behind the curtain.

2024.11.26  
ZEPP TOUR 2024  
ZEPP HANEDA day 2  

We spent the tour finale with a full house of Masters and Princesses.  
It felt like the last okyuji of the year.  
It was just an incredibly fun, passionate, and amazing nightğŸ•Š  

We all shouted, laughed, sang, and went wild together...  
Wasn't it just the best BAND-MAID experience ever?!  
It definitely was, right?!ğŸ•Š  
I also worked hard on the guitar solo!  

Next year, I want to power up even more and jump around a lot during our okyuji!

en:
2024.11.3 @ Zepp Osaka Bayside

Nice to meet you, Bayside! 
I always get a little nervous when performing at a new venue, but seeing everyone's faces puts me at ease!

I had 551 prepared for us in catering, ate some on stage during the show, had more after the performance, and even bought some as a souvenir to enjoy at home later.

It was my first time eating so much 551 in one day!

I loved it so much that we formed a limited-time 3-piece band called "551" just for this day.

The second show of our tour, filled with firsts, was so much funâ€”thank you! 

P.S. I also had a lot of takoyaki!

en:
2024.11.25,26 @ Zepp Haneda

BAND-MAID ZEPP TOUR 2024
TOUR FINAL Tokyo 2 days!

Thank you for an amazing two days!

Iâ€™m so happy we were able to take revenge on the ZEPP TOUR that was canceled four years ago.

It was truly a rich and fun tour.

I really feel that this was a tour we could only do now, having grown after our 10th anniversary.

2024 has been an incredibly intense year.
I must have been drumming for 350 out of the 365 days.
