en:
So beautiful...

I received some behind-the-scenes photos of the signature preparations, so I'm sharing them! Are they coming in one after another?

Today was the dress rehearsal~. I was a bit tired from all the arranging, recording, and live preparations! But seeing everyone really boosted my energy ğŸº. After it was over, I enjoyed some tamakonnyaku and beer for dinner, followed by curry. 

Tomorrow, I'll be working on the acoustic arrangements! I'm looking forward to the billboard too.

First up, the Liquid Room for the first time in 8 years?! Letâ€™s have fun~ 

Music is happiness~ 

#b

en:
2025.2.3  
"BAND-MAID Spin-Off Okyuji" produced by SAIKI  

Today was the day of Sai-chan's wild production!  

Doing three instrumental songs in a row was quite a physical challenge, and more than anything, the words "Get the crowd hyped!" were...!  
(When my beloved Sai-chan says it, I have no choice but to give it my allâ€¦!!)  

Even though I'm a band member, I must admit I'm not great at hyping up the crowd or projecting my voice, so I had to rely on a little liquid courage...  
(The last photo shows my face reflecting on relying on alcohol...)  

I hope this can be a source of entertainment for everyone for a while! ğŸ¥¹

Iâ€™ll keep supporting you forever! I love you! ğŸ«¶

en:
ã€Thank Youã€‘  
I had the honor of appearing on #AllStarThankYouFestival25Spring as BAND-MAID's Kobato Miku!  
I managed to secure the top spot in the buzzer round and became the Period Champion! I also took 2nd and 6th place!  
Thank you all for your support!  

Starting in April, the anime "Rock is a Lady's Pastime" will begin airing on the TBS television network.  
#RockLady  
Our latest song "Ready to Rock" will be the opening theme, so be sure to check it out!  
You can check out BAND-MAID's music here: youtube.com/@BANDMAI

en:
ğŸ•ŠğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µğŸ“º  
We appeared on #AllStarThankYouFestival25 this spring! ğŸ•Š  

It was a 6-hour live broadcast!  
We had the honor of performing the OP theme song for the TV anime "Rock is a Lady's Taste," which starts airing on April 3rd, alongside Akira Sekine, who plays the role of Ririsa. ğŸ•Š  
It was my first time on live TV, so I was super nervous, but with Akira by my side, I was able to do my best! â™¡  
And guess what!!!  
I even became the Period Champion!!!  
(I also placed 2nd and 6th once each!)

ã€Anime // Rock is a Lady's Hobbyã€‘ 

Starting tonight, April 3rd (Thursday) at 11:56 PM, the new anime "Rock is a Lady's Hobby" will begin its nationwide simultaneous broadcast on 28 TBS network stations. 

The opening theme features a new song by BAND-MAID titled "Ready to Rock," performed by KANAMI, who released her signature model with PRS last year! 

And guess what? The guitars that appear in this anime are actually inspired by PRSâœ¨ 

The attention to detail in the depiction of the guitars is just amazing!

BAND-MAID Billboard Live Acoustic Tour OSAKA

It was an exclusive okyuji for our Masters! The distance felt so close, and to be honest, I was really nervous ğŸ¥¹

We all worked hard on the arrangements and ensemble practice!! How did you like it...? I had so much fun!! â™¡â™¡ 
Next up is the Tokyo performance on April 13! There will also be a later streaming for those who can't make it, so please look forward to it ğŸ’š

And also, today, April 3 (Thursday) at 11:56 PM, a new work will be aired on TBS and 28 other networks!

Looking back...

2025.3.20 & 4.13  
BAND-MAID Billboard Live Acoustic Tour

We held a special okyuji just for our OMEISYUSAMA at two locations, Osaka and Tokyo.

It was a luxurious time in a different atmosphere than usual at Billboard. I was nervous, but it was a wonderful experience.  
Thank you to all the Masters and Princesses who came home to us!  
We hope you enjoyed our songs with unique arrangements that only an acoustic performance can offer!

en:
2025.3.20 & 4.13  
"BAND-MAID Billboard Live Acoustic Tour"

Exclusive TOUR for our OMEISYUSAMA  
Thank you for the two shows in Osaka and Tokyo!

It was our first acoustic okyuji at Billboard, a place we've always wanted to perform, so I was truly happy!

The dress code for the okyuji was refreshing. Our OMEISYUSAMA looked absolutely wonderful!

With more songs performed by all five of us, we were able to expand our arrangements and grow while having fun.

I hope we can do okyuji at Billboard again!

d performances on 7/26 in Hokkaido and 8/8 in Aichi are now available!  
ãƒ»All performances from the First Round are SOLD OUT, and other Second Round shows are also in high demand!  

#BANDMAID #Tour2025 ğŸ¸âœ¨

I had the honor of being the OP theme song artist and motion actor for the TV anime "Rock wa Shukujo no Tashimi de Shite." 

The days I spent with Otowa are treasures to me. 

I'm so happy to have had the dream-like experience of recording the OP and in-show songs, as well as being a motion actor. 

Being a motion actor has always been something I wanted to try. I was thrilled to take on this challenge and perform alongside the BAND-MAID members. It gave me a lot of strength. 

During my first filming, I was struggling with how to express Otowa, and someone said, "Akane-san, you're already Otowa, so just be yourself!"

en:
[#AnimeExpo2025]  
BAND-MAID's Kobato Miku made an appearance at "Anime Expo 2025" happening in Los Angeles, USA, as a special guest for the North American premiere of "TÅgen Anki" Episode 1 and a talk panel! Thank you all for coming!  
After the stage, I took a commemorative photo with Kazuki Ura, who plays the main character, Shiki Ichinose! @kazuki_ura1018  

Be sure to check out BAND-MAID's ending theme song for the anime "TÅgen Anki," titled "What is justice?"

2025.8.23  
"SUMMER SONIC BANGKOK 2025"

Thank you so much for coming to our show!  
I'm so happy I got to perform in Thailand!
